item.title: 【Interference in A/B Tests】A/B 测试中的干扰
item.description:
【

A/B testing is the gold standard for online experimentation used by most companies to test out their product features. Whereas A/B test experimentation works just fine in most settings, it is particularly susceptible to interference bias, particularly in the case of online marketplaces or social networks. In this article, we aim to look at the situations with interference bias and some potential ways to mitigate its effect on evaluation.

SUTVA, the Fundamental Assumption of A/B Testing and Its Violations

One of the fundamental assumptions of A/B Testing is SUTVA — Stable Unit Treatment Value Assumption. The potential outcome of treatment in the randomization unit depends only on the treatment they receive and not on the treatments assigned to other subjects.

】

A/B 测试是大多数公司用来测试其产品功能的在线实验的黄金标准。尽管 A/B 测试实验在大多数情况下效果都很好，但它特别容易受到干扰偏差的影响，尤其是在在线市场或社交网络的情况下。在本文中，我们旨在研究存在干扰偏差的情况以及减轻其对评估影响的一些潜在方法。

SUTVA，A/B 测试的基本假设及其违规

A/B 测试的基本假设之一是 SUTVA — 稳定单位处理值假设。随机化单元中治疗的潜在结果仅取决于他们接受的治疗，而不取决于分配给其他受试者的治疗。

item.title: 【Ensuring Data Integrity Through Anomaly Detection: Essential Tools for Data Engineers】通过异常检测确保数据完整性：数据工程师的基本工具
item.description:

In the trending landscape of Machine Learning and AI, companies are tirelessly innovating to deliver cutting-edge solutions for their customers. However, amidst this rapid evolution, ensuring a robust data universe characterized by high quality and integrity is indispensable. While much emphasis is often placed on refining AI models, the significance of pristine datasets can sometimes be overshadowed. 

This article sets out to explore some of the essential tools required by organizations in the domain of data engineering to efficiently improve data quality and triage/analyze data for effective business-centric machine learning analytics, reporting, and anomaly detection. 本文旨在探讨数据工程领域组织有效提高数据质量和分类/分析数据，以实现有效的以业务为中心的机器学习分析、报告和异常检测。为了说明这些工具/框架及其重要性，让我们考虑金融科技行业内的一个场景。

item.title: 【Multimodal Search in AI Apps With PostgreSQL pgvector】使用 PostgreSQL pgvector 在 AI 应用程序中进行多模式搜索
item.description:
【

Large language models (LLMs) have significantly evolved beyond generating text responses to text prompts. These models are now trained to possess advanced capabilities like interpreting images and providing detailed descriptions from visual inputs. This gives users an even greater search capacity.

In this article, I’ll demonstrate how to build an application with multimodal search functionality. Users of this application can upload an image or provide text input that allows them to search a database of Indian recipes. The application is built to work with multiple LLM providers, allowing users to choose between OpenAI, or a model running locally with Ollama. Text embeddings are then stored and queried in PostgreSQL using pgvector.

】

大型语言模型 (LLM) 的发展已经超越了对文本提示生成文本响应的范围。这些模型现在经过训练，拥有先进的功能，例如解释图像和根据视觉输入提供详细描述。这为用户提供了更大的搜索能力。

在本文中，我将演示如何构建具有多模式搜索功能的应用程序。该应用程序的用户可以上传图像或提供文本输入，以便搜索印度食谱数据库。该应用程序旨在与多个 LLM 提供商合作，允许用户在 OpenAI 或使用 本地运行的模型之间进行选择奥拉马。然后使用 pgvector 在 PostgreSQL 中存储和查询文本嵌入。

item.title: 【Two-Tower Model for Fraud Detection: A Comprehensive Guide】欺诈检测的两塔模型：综合指南
item.description:
【

Fraud detection is a very important task in most industries, especially in finance and e-commerce. The classic machine learning models struggle to handle the subtlety and complexity of patterns rooted in fraudulent behavior. The dual-tower or Siamese network model provides a powerful architecture to handle the complex tasks of parallel processing with two different sets of inputs, thus helping capture the intricate relationships between them. This article presents how to apply the two-tower model to fraud detection, with detailed explanations, code snippets, and practical illustrations.

What Is a Two-Tower Model?

It is an architecture that comprises two independent neural networks: one dealing with one type of input data and the second dealing with another. These two towers may work independently, although their output results are combined to make a single unified prediction. This architecture works very nicely in tasks involving finding relationships or similarities between two diverse sources of data.

】

欺诈检测在大多数行业中都是一项非常重要的任务，尤其是在金融和电子商务领域。经典的机器学习模型很难处理源于欺诈行为的模式的微妙性和复杂性。双塔或暹罗网络模型提供了强大的架构来处理具有两组不同输入的并行处理的复杂任务，从而有助于捕获它们之间复杂的关系。本文介绍了如何将两塔模型应用于欺诈检测，并配有详细解释、代码片段和实际插图。

什么是两塔模型？

它是一种由两个独立的神经网络组成的架构：一个处理一种类型处理输入数据，第二个处理另一个。这两个塔可以独立工作，尽管它们的输出结果被组合起来做出单一的统一预测。这种架构在涉及查找两个不同数据源之间的关系或相似性的任务中非常有效。

item.title: 【Plot Your REST Endpoints Using grafana-infinity-datasource】使用 grafana-infinity-datasource 绘制您的 REST 端点
item.description:
【

When it comes to observability Grafana is the go-to tool for visualization. A Grafana dashboard consists of various forms of visualizations which are usually backed by a database.
This is not always the case. Sometimes instead of pushing the data from the database as is, you might want to refine the data. This cannot always be achieved through the functionalities the DB provides. For example, you might want to fetch results from a proprietary API. This is where the grafana-infinity-datasource plugin kicks in. With grafana-infinity-datasource, you can create visualizations based on JSON, XML, CSV, etc. You can issue an HTTP request to a REST API and plot the received data.

Tutorial

Let’s assume we have an eShop application. We will create a simple Python API using FastAPI to manage the items of the eShop and the purchase volume.

】

说到可观察性，Grafana 是可视化的首选工具。 Grafana 仪表板由各种形式的可视化效果组成，这些可视化效果通常由数据库支持。
这并非总是如此。有时，您可能不想按原样从数据库推送数据，而是希望优化数据。这并不总是可以通过数据库提供的功能来实现。例如，您可能想要从专有 API 获取结果。这是 grafana-infinity-datasource 插件的位置开始使用。使用 grafana-infinity-datasource，您可以基于 JSON、XML、CSV 等创建可视化。您可以向 REST API 发出 HTTP 请求并绘制接收到的数据。

教程

假设我们有一个 eShop 应用程序。我们将使用 FastAPI 创建一个简单的 Python API 来管理 eShop 的商品和购买量。

item.title: 【Software Engineering Grief】软件工程悲伤
item.description:
【

Human beings resist change.  This is not personal opinion, it's our defense mechanism against uncertainty.  If you narrow your target to software engineers and technologists - who, in almost all cases, are humans - the defense mechanism can become a survival mechanism.

Successful companies rarely rest on their laurels and assume the money will flow in unimpeded by change. Instead, companies constantly analyze the current to define their vision for the future:

How do economic and market conditions affect our ability to sell?

Would new features or product offerings attract new customers while retaining existing customers?

Could we more efficiently increase market share through acquisitions rather than internal product development?

Are there partner opportunities beneficial to us?

How can we expand the industries in which are products are sold?

】

人类抵制改变。  这不是个人意见，而是我们的防御机制不确定性。  如果您将目标缩小到软件工程师和技术人员（在几乎所有情况下，他们都是人类），防御机制就可以成为一种生存机制。

成功的公司很少满足于现状，并认为资金会不受变革阻碍地流入。相反，公司不断分析当前情况来定义未来愿景：

新功能或产品能否在保留现有客户的同时吸引新客户？
